name: moose
description: next gen moose technology including infinite scroll gallary, range searchable titles, author notices, etc.

scripts.prepublish: cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.css public/bulma.css && npx browserify public/index.js -o public/index.bundle.js
scripts.bundle: cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.css public/bulma.css && npx browserify public/index.js -o public/index.bundle.js
